name: token-farm
description: Transforms figma design tokens to common config files serving different styling frameworks

scripts.transform:light: npx token-transformer input/tokens.json input/mw-theme.json global,mw-theme global
scripts.transform:dark: npx token-transformer input/tokens.json input/mw-theme_dark.json global,mw-theme_dark global
scripts.transform: npm run transform:global && npm run transform:light && npm run transform:dark
scripts.build: npm run transform && npm run build:style-dictionary

author: Martin Prinz
